entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:23 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -30.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Airport 10:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -30.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -34.9°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
